QuestData.Title: Fel Bent for Leather
QuestData.Description: Ah, my faithful assistant. I have just the task for you.$b$bAs you have seen, fel power permeates living tissue and can easily be coaxed out.$b$bAlso, these damned bats are driving me to my wits' end. There is an opportunity to kill two bats with one blade, it seems. Your blade.$b$bTake this crystal. It should rip those hellions from the sky and into your waiting arms.$b$bYou may as well bring back their hides, if only to shut up that fellow in the corner for a few moments.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Collect 100 Felbat Hide Scraps for Kyrtos.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Felbat Hide Scraps for Kyrtos.
QuestData.RewardText: I can no longer hear their shrieking. Finally, peace and quiet!
